title: Full Stack Developer
shortDescription: We are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer with experience in Node.js, React, and MongoDB.
fullDescription:
## Job Description

We are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer with experience in Node.js, React, and MongoDB. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and implementing new features.

## Responsibilities
- Design, develop, and maintain software applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs

## Requirements
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 2-4 years of relevant experience
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication skills

title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: Exciting opportunity for fresh graduates to join our dynamic software engineering team.
fullDescription:
## Job Description

Exciting opportunity for fresh graduates to join our dynamic software engineering team. Training will be provided.

## Responsibilities
- Learn and apply software development principles
- Assist in developing new features
- Write clean and maintainable code
- Participate in code reviews

## Requirements
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- Strong programming fundamentals
- Good problem-solving skills
- Willingness to learn new technologies

title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: Full Time Graduates, with record of First class through out their academics including graduation in the following areas: Computer Science
fullDescription:
About the job
Syniverse is the world‚Äôs most connected company. Whether we‚Äôre developing the technology that enables intelligent cars to safely react to traffic changes or freeing travelers to explore by keeping their devices online wherever they go, we believe in leading the world forward. Which is why we work with some of the world‚Äôs most recognized brands. Eight of the top 10 banks. Four of the top 5 global technology companies. Over 900 communications providers. And how we‚Äôre able to provide our incredible talent with an innovative culture and great benefits.

Who We're Looking For

Syniverse is looking for enthusiastic graduates to join our organization under the Graduate Apprentice Program. This program will help to have an excellent point of departure towards career growth. This competitive apprenticeship program is a robust experience that offers you exposure to the business world through a meaningful work experience. We inspire you to perform at your pinnacle and educate you on everything you need to know about Syniverse.

Some Of What You'll Do

Scope of the Role:

Direct Reports: This is an individual contributor role and has no direct reports

Key Responsibilities

During the 12-month period, you will work in different functional areas and be actively involved in day-to-day business and projects simultaneously benefitting from professional and individual coaching. 
You will work on right combination of assignments that will develop your competencies, skills, and interests. 
Assist within the relevant department, but also learn about other aspects of the company.
Prepare presentations and complete evaluations and assessments as assigned. 
Attend all training and information sessions in order to gain the knowledge and skills needed to succeed.
Accept, respond to and implement any feedback offered.

Experience, Education, And Certifications

Full Time Graduates, with record of First class through out their academics including graduation in the following areas: Computer Science, Business Administration, Marketing, Cyber Security, Information Technology, Accounting, or related business/STEM field.
Candidates should have passed each semester / each year of engineering in first attempt only with no backlogs
Candidates who have appeared for the final engineering examinations in the year of selection only, are eligible for selection as Graduate Apprenticeship
Graduates cannot exceed 3 years of completing their college education to be eligible.

Additional Requirements

Interest working in the Technology/Telecommunications Industry
Good Computer skills including Microsoft Office.
Excellent organizing and communication skills.

title: Graduate Engineering Trainee
shortDescription: The Graduate Apprentice Program at Syniverse is designed to give fresh graduates a strong foundation for their professional career.
fullDescription:
Graduate Apprentice Trainee ‚Äì Syniverse

Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
Program Duration: 12 Months
Employment Type: Graduate Apprenticeship

About Syniverse

Syniverse is one of the world‚Äôs most connected technology companies, working with leading global banks, telecom providers, and technology firms. We build solutions that keep people and businesses connected across the world, enabling innovation in mobility, communication, and digital services.

Program Overview

The Graduate Apprentice Program at Syniverse is designed to give fresh graduates a strong foundation for their professional career. This structured 12-month program provides hands-on experience, exposure to real business projects, and continuous learning through training and mentoring.

Key Responsibilities

Work across multiple functional teams during the apprenticeship period

Assist in day-to-day business operations and live projects

Develop technical and professional skills through real assignments

Prepare presentations, reports, and evaluations as required

Attend training sessions and learning workshops

Accept feedback and actively work on improvements

Collaborate with teams to understand different business processes

Eligibility Criteria

Full-time graduates with First Class throughout academics

Graduation in Computer Science, IT, Cyber Security, Business Administration, Marketing, Accounting, or related STEM fields

Must have cleared all semesters in the first attempt (no backlogs)

Final year students appearing for exams in the year of selection only

Graduation completed within the last 3 years

Required Skills

Interest in Technology / Telecommunications Industry

Basic computer knowledge and Microsoft Office skills

Good communication and presentation skills

Strong organizational and learning mindset

Why Join Syniverse

Exposure to a global technology organization

Hands-on learning with real-world projects

Professional coaching and mentorship

Inclusive, collaborative, and transparent work culture

Strong career foundation in a fast-growing industry

Referral Note

If you know someone currently working at Syniverse, request them to submit a referral before applying.
